00028 void begrun(void)
00029 {
00030   struct global_data_all_processes all;
00031 
00032   if(ThisTask == 0)
00033     {
00034       printf("\nThis is Gadget, version `%s'.\n", GADGETVERSION);
00035       printf("\nRunning on %d processors.\n", NTask);
00036     }
00037 
00038   read_parameter_file(ParameterFile);   /* ... read in parameters for this run */
00039 
00040   allocate_commbuffers();       /* ... allocate buffer-memory for particle 
00041                                    exchange during force computation */
00042   set_units();
00043 
00044 #if defined(PERIODIC) && (!defined(PMGRID) || defined(FORCETEST))
00045   ewald_init();
00046 #endif
00047 
00048   open_outputfiles();
00049 
00050   random_generator = gsl_rng_alloc(gsl_rng_ranlxd1);
00051   gsl_rng_set(random_generator, 42);    /* start-up seed */
00052 
00053 #ifdef PMGRID
00054   long_range_init();
00055 #endif
00056 
00057   All.TimeLastRestartFile = CPUThisRun;
00058 
00059 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00060   AllocateInteractionTable(INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH, PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS + 1);
00061   init_geofactor_table();
00062 #endif
00063 
00064   if(RestartFlag == 0 || RestartFlag == 2)
00065     {
00066       set_random_numbers();
00067 
00068       init();                   /* ... read in initial model */
00069     }
00070   else
00071     {
00072       all = All;                /* save global variables. (will be read from restart file) */
00073 
00074       restart(RestartFlag);     /* ... read restart file. Note: This also resets 
00075                                    all variables in the struct `All'. 
00076                                    However, during the run, some variables in the parameter
00077                                    file are allowed to be changed, if desired. These need to 
00078                                    copied in the way below.
00079                                    Note:  All.PartAllocFactor is treated in restart() separately.  
00080                                  */
00081 
00082       All.MinSizeTimestep = all.MinSizeTimestep;
00083       All.MaxSizeTimestep = all.MaxSizeTimestep;
00084       All.BufferSize = all.BufferSize;
00085       All.BunchSizeForce = all.BunchSizeForce;
00086       All.BunchSizeDensity = all.BunchSizeDensity;
00087       All.BunchSizeHydro = all.BunchSizeHydro;
00088       All.BunchSizeDomain = all.BunchSizeDomain;
00089 
00090       All.TimeLimitCPU = all.TimeLimitCPU;
00091       All.ResubmitOn = all.ResubmitOn;
00092       All.TimeBetSnapshot = all.TimeBetSnapshot;
00093       All.TimeBetStatistics = all.TimeBetStatistics;
00094       All.CpuTimeBetRestartFile = all.CpuTimeBetRestartFile;
00095       All.ErrTolIntAccuracy = all.ErrTolIntAccuracy;
00096       All.MaxRMSDisplacementFac = all.MaxRMSDisplacementFac;
00097 
00098       All.ErrTolForceAcc = all.ErrTolForceAcc;
00099 
00100       All.TypeOfTimestepCriterion = all.TypeOfTimestepCriterion;
00101       All.TypeOfOpeningCriterion = all.TypeOfOpeningCriterion;
00102       All.NumFilesWrittenInParallel = all.NumFilesWrittenInParallel;
00103       All.TreeDomainUpdateFrequency = all.TreeDomainUpdateFrequency;
00104 
00105       All.SnapFormat = all.SnapFormat;
00106       All.NumFilesPerSnapshot = all.NumFilesPerSnapshot;
00107       All.MaxNumNgbDeviation = all.MaxNumNgbDeviation;
00108       All.ArtBulkViscConst = all.ArtBulkViscConst;
00109 
00110 
00111       All.OutputListOn = all.OutputListOn;
00112       All.CourantFac = all.CourantFac;
00113 
00114       All.OutputListLength = all.OutputListLength;
00115       memcpy(All.OutputListTimes, all.OutputListTimes, sizeof(double) * All.OutputListLength);
00116 
00117 
00118       strcpy(All.ResubmitCommand, all.ResubmitCommand);
00119       strcpy(All.OutputListFilename, all.OutputListFilename);
00120       strcpy(All.OutputDir, all.OutputDir);
00121       strcpy(All.RestartFile, all.RestartFile);
00122       strcpy(All.EnergyFile, all.EnergyFile);
00123       strcpy(All.InfoFile, all.InfoFile);
00124       strcpy(All.CpuFile, all.CpuFile);
00125       strcpy(All.TimingsFile, all.TimingsFile);
00126       strcpy(All.SnapshotFileBase, all.SnapshotFileBase);
00127 
00128       if(All.TimeMax != all.TimeMax)
00129         readjust_timebase(All.TimeMax, all.TimeMax);
00130     }
00131 
00132 #ifdef PMGRID
00133   long_range_init_regionsize();
00134 #endif
00135  
00136   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00137     init_drift_table();
00138 
00139   if(RestartFlag == 2)
00140     All.Ti_nextoutput = find_next_outputtime(All.Ti_Current + 1);
00141   else
00142     All.Ti_nextoutput = find_next_outputtime(All.Ti_Current);
00143 
00144 
00145   All.TimeLastRestartFile = CPUThisRun;
00146 }

00150 
00154 void set_units(void)
00155 {
00156   double meanweight;
00157 
00158   All.UnitTime_in_s = All.UnitLength_in_cm / All.UnitVelocity_in_cm_per_s;
00159   All.UnitTime_in_Megayears = All.UnitTime_in_s / SEC_PER_MEGAYEAR;
00160 
00161   if(All.GravityConstantInternal == 0)
00162     All.G = GRAVITY / pow(All.UnitLength_in_cm, 3) * All.UnitMass_in_g * pow(All.UnitTime_in_s, 2);
00163   else
00164     All.G = All.GravityConstantInternal;
00165 
00166   All.UnitDensity_in_cgs = All.UnitMass_in_g / pow(All.UnitLength_in_cm, 3);
00167   All.UnitPressure_in_cgs = All.UnitMass_in_g / All.UnitLength_in_cm / pow(All.UnitTime_in_s, 2);
00168   All.UnitCoolingRate_in_cgs = All.UnitPressure_in_cgs / All.UnitTime_in_s;
00169   All.UnitEnergy_in_cgs = All.UnitMass_in_g * pow(All.UnitLength_in_cm, 2) / pow(All.UnitTime_in_s, 2);
00170 
00171   /* convert some physical input parameters to internal units */
00172 
00173   All.Hubble = HUBBLE * All.UnitTime_in_s;
00174 
00175   if(ThisTask == 0)
00176     {
00177       printf("\nHubble (internal units) = %g\n", All.Hubble);
00178       printf("G (internal units) = %g\n", All.G);
00179       printf("UnitMass_in_g = %g \n", All.UnitMass_in_g);
00180       printf("UnitTime_in_s = %g \n", All.UnitTime_in_s);
00181       printf("UnitVelocity_in_cm_per_s = %g \n", All.UnitVelocity_in_cm_per_s);
00182       printf("UnitDensity_in_cgs = %g \n", All.UnitDensity_in_cgs);
00183       printf("UnitEnergy_in_cgs = %g \n", All.UnitEnergy_in_cgs);
00184       printf("\n");
00185     }
00186 
00187   meanweight = 4.0 / (1 + 3 * HYDROGEN_MASSFRAC);       /* note: we assume neutral gas here */
00188 
00189 #ifdef ISOTHERM_EQS
00190   All.MinEgySpec = 0;
00191 #else
00192   All.MinEgySpec = 1 / meanweight * (1.0 / GAMMA_MINUS1) * (BOLTZMANN / PROTONMASS) * All.MinGasTemp;
00193   All.MinEgySpec *= All.UnitMass_in_g / All.UnitEnergy_in_cgs;
00194 #endif
00195 
00196 }

00199 
00204 void open_outputfiles(void)
00205 {
00206   char mode[2], buf[200];
00207 
00208   if(ThisTask != 0)             /* only the root processor writes to the log files */
00209     return;
00210 
00211   if(RestartFlag == 0)
00212     strcpy(mode, "w");
00213   else
00214     strcpy(mode, "a");
00215 
00216 
00217   sprintf(buf, "%s%s", All.OutputDir, All.CpuFile);
00218   if(!(FdCPU = fopen(buf, mode)))
00219     {
00220       printf("error in opening file '%s'\n", buf);
00221       endrun(1);
00222     }
00223 
00224   sprintf(buf, "%s%s", All.OutputDir, All.InfoFile);
00225   if(!(FdInfo = fopen(buf, mode)))
00226     {
00227       printf("error in opening file '%s'\n", buf);
00228       endrun(1);
00229     }
00230 
00231   sprintf(buf, "%s%s", All.OutputDir, All.EnergyFile);
00232   if(!(FdEnergy = fopen(buf, mode)))
00233     {
00234       printf("error in opening file '%s'\n", buf);
00235       endrun(1);
00236     }
00237 
00238   sprintf(buf, "%s%s", All.OutputDir, All.TimingsFile);
00239   if(!(FdTimings = fopen(buf, mode)))
00240     {
00241       printf("error in opening file '%s'\n", buf);
00242       endrun(1);
00243     }
00244 
00245 #ifdef FORCETEST
00246   if(RestartFlag == 0)
00247     {
00248       sprintf(buf, "%s%s", All.OutputDir, "forcetest.txt");
00249       if(!(FdForceTest = fopen(buf, "w")))
00250         {
00251           printf("error in opening file '%s'\n", buf);
00252           endrun(1);
00253         }
00254       fclose(FdForceTest);
00255     }
00256 #endif
00257 }
00258 
00259 
00262 void close_outputfiles(void)
00263 {
00264   if(ThisTask != 0)             /* only the root processor writes to the log files */
00265     return;
00266 
00267   fclose(FdCPU);
00268   fclose(FdInfo);
00269   fclose(FdEnergy);
00270   fclose(FdTimings);
00271 #ifdef FORCETEST
00272   fclose(FdForceTest);
00273 #endif
00274 }

00285 void read_parameter_file(char *fname)
00286 {
00287 #define DOUBLE 1
00288 #define STRING 2
00289 #define INT 3
00290 #define MAXTAGS 300
00291 
00292   FILE *fd, *fdout;
00293   char buf[200], buf1[200], buf2[200], buf3[400];
00294   int i, j, nt;
00295   int id[MAXTAGS];
00296   void *addr[MAXTAGS];
00297   char tag[MAXTAGS][50];
00298   int  errorFlag = 0;
00299 
00300 
00301   if(sizeof(long long) != 8)
00302     {
00303       if(ThisTask == 0)
00304         printf("\nType `long long' is not 64 bit on this platform. Stopping.\n\n");
00305       endrun(0);
00306     }
00307 
00308   if(sizeof(int) != 4)
00309     {
00310       if(ThisTask == 0)
00311         printf("\nType `int' is not 32 bit on this platform. Stopping.\n\n");
00312       endrun(0);
00313     }
00314 
00315   if(sizeof(float) != 4)
00316     {
00317       if(ThisTask == 0)
00318         printf("\nType `float' is not 32 bit on this platform. Stopping.\n\n");
00319       endrun(0);
00320     }
00321 
00322   if(sizeof(double) != 8)
00323     {
00324       if(ThisTask == 0)
00325         printf("\nType `double' is not 64 bit on this platform. Stopping.\n\n");
00326       endrun(0);
00327     }
00328 
00329 
00330   if(ThisTask == 0)             /* read parameter file on process 0 */
00331     {
00332       nt = 0;
00333 
00334       strcpy(tag[nt], "InitCondFile");
00335       addr[nt] = All.InitCondFile;
00336       id[nt++] = STRING;
00337 
00338       strcpy(tag[nt], "OutputDir");
00339       addr[nt] = All.OutputDir;
00340       id[nt++] = STRING;
00341 
00342       strcpy(tag[nt], "SnapshotFileBase");

00350       strcpy(tag[nt], "CpuFile");

00589

00591       addr[nt] = &All.MinGasTemp;
00592       id[nt++] = DOUBLE;
00593 
00594 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK 
00595       strcpy(tag[nt], "InteractionCrossSection");
00596       addr[nt] = &All.InteractionCrossSection;
00597       id[nt++] = DOUBLE;
00598 #endif
00599 
00600       if((fd = fopen(fname, "r")))
00601         {
00602           sprintf(buf, "%s%s", fname, "-usedvalues");
00603           if(!(fdout = fopen(buf, "w")))
00604             {
00605               printf("error opening file '%s' \n", buf);
00606               errorFlag = 1;
00607             }
00608           else
00609             {
00610               while(!feof(fd))
00611                 {
00612                   *buf = 0;
00613                   fgets(buf, 200, fd);
00614                   if(sscanf(buf, "%s%s%s", buf1, buf2, buf3) < 2)
00615                     continue;
00616 
00617                   if(buf1[0] == '%')
00618                     continue;
00619 
00620                   for(i = 0, j = -1; i < nt; i++)
00621                     if(strcmp(buf1, tag[i]) == 0)
00622                       {
00623                         j = i;
00624                         tag[i][0] = 0;
00625                         break;
00626                       }
00627 
00628                   if(j >= 0)
00629                     {
00630                       switch (id[j])
00631                         {
00632                         case DOUBLE:
00633                           *((double *) addr[j]) = atof(buf2);
00634                           fprintf(fdout, "%-35s%g\n", buf1, *((double *) addr[j]));
00635                           break;
00636                         case STRING:
00637                           strcpy(addr[j], buf2);
00638                           fprintf(fdout, "%-35s%s\n", buf1, buf2);
00639                           break;
00640                         case INT:
00641                           *((int *) addr[j]) = atoi(buf2);
00642                           fprintf(fdout, "%-35s%d\n", buf1, *((int *) addr[j]));
00643                           break;
00644                         }
00645                     }
00646                   else
00647                     {
00648                       fprintf(stdout, "Error in file %s:   Tag '%s' not allowed or multiple defined.\n",
00649                               fname, buf1);
00650                       errorFlag = 1;
00651                     }
00652                 }
00653               fclose(fd);
00654               fclose(fdout);
00655 
00656               i = strlen(All.OutputDir);
00657               if(i > 0)
00658                 if(All.OutputDir[i - 1] != '/')
00659                   strcat(All.OutputDir, "/");
00660 
00661               sprintf(buf1, "%s%s", fname, "-usedvalues");
00662               sprintf(buf2, "%s%s", All.OutputDir, "parameters-usedvalues");
00663               sprintf(buf3, "cp %s %s", buf1, buf2);
00664               system(buf3);
00665             }
00666         }
00667       else
00668         {
00669           printf("\nParameter file %s not found.\n\n", fname);
00670           errorFlag = 2;
00671         }
00672 
00673       if(errorFlag != 2)
00674         for(i = 0; i < nt; i++)
00675           {
00676             if(*tag[i])
00677               {
00678                 printf("Error. I miss a value for tag '%s' in parameter file '%s'.\n", tag[i], fname);
00679                 errorFlag = 1;
00680               }
00681           }
00682 
00683       if(All.OutputListOn && errorFlag == 0)
00684         errorFlag += read_outputlist(All.OutputListFilename);
00685       else
00686         All.OutputListLength = 0;
00687     }
00688 
00689   MPI_Bcast(&errorFlag, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00690 
00691   if(errorFlag)
00692     {
00693       MPI_Finalize();
00694       exit(0);
00695     }
00696 
00697   /* now communicate the relevant parameters to the other processes */
00698   MPI_Bcast(&All, sizeof(struct global_data_all_processes), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00699 
00700 
00701   if(All.NumFilesWrittenInParallel < 1)
00702     {
00703       if(ThisTask == 0)
00704         printf("NumFilesWrittenInParallel MUST be at least 1\n");
00705       endrun(0);
00706     }
00707 
00708   if(All.NumFilesWrittenInParallel > NTask)
00709     {
00710       if(ThisTask == 0)
00711         printf("NumFilesWrittenInParallel MUST be smaller than number of processors\n");
00712       endrun(0);
00713     }
00714 
00715 #ifdef PERIODIC
00716   if(All.PeriodicBoundariesOn == 0)
00717     {
00718       if(ThisTask == 0)
00719         {
00720           printf("Code was compiled with periodic boundary conditions switched on.\n");
00721           printf("You must set `PeriodicBoundariesOn=1', or recompile the code.\n");
00722         }
00723       endrun(0);
00724     }
00725 #else
00726   if(All.PeriodicBoundariesOn == 1)
00727     {
00728       if(ThisTask == 0)
00729         {
00730           printf("Code was compiled with periodic boundary conditions switched off.\n");
00731           printf("You must set `PeriodicBoundariesOn=0', or recompile the code.\n");
00732         }
00733       endrun(0);
00734     }
00735 #endif
00736 
00737 
00738   if(All.TypeOfTimestepCriterion >= 1)
00739     {
00740       if(ThisTask == 0)
00741         {
00742           printf("The specified timestep criterion\n");
00743           printf("is not valid\n");
00744         }
00745       endrun(0);
00746     }
00747 
00748 #if defined(LONG_X) ||  defined(LONG_Y) || defined(LONG_Z)
00749 #ifndef NOGRAVITY
00750   if(ThisTask == 0)
00751     {
00752       printf("Code was compiled with LONG_X/Y/Z, but not with NOGRAVITY.\n");
00753       printf("Stretched periodic boxes are not implemented for gravity yet.\n");
00754     }
00755   endrun(0);
00756 #endif
00757 #endif
00758 
00759 #undef DOUBLE
00760 #undef STRING
00761 #undef INT
00762 #undef MAXTAGS
00763 }
00764 
00765 
00770 int read_outputlist(char *fname)
00771 {
00772   FILE *fd;
00773 
00774   if(!(fd = fopen(fname, "r")))
00775     {
00776       printf("can't read output list in file '%s'\n", fname);
00777       return 1;
00778     }
00779 
00780   All.OutputListLength = 0;
00781   do
00782     {
00783       if(fscanf(fd, " %lg ", &All.OutputListTimes[All.OutputListLength]) == 1)
00784         All.OutputListLength++;
00785       else
00786         break;
00787     }
00788   while(All.OutputListLength < MAXLEN_OUTPUTLIST);
00789 
00790   fclose(fd);
00791 
00792   printf("\nfound %d times in output-list.\n", All.OutputListLength);
00793 
00794   return 0;
00795 }
00796 
00797 
00804 void readjust_timebase(double TimeMax_old, double TimeMax_new)
00805 {
00806   int i;
00807   long long ti_end;
00808 
00809   if(ThisTask == 0)
00810     {
00811       printf("\nAll.TimeMax has been changed in the parameterfile\n");
00812       printf("Need to adjust integer timeline\n\n\n");
00813     }
00814 
00815   if(TimeMax_new < TimeMax_old)
00816     {
00817       if(ThisTask == 0)
00818         printf("\nIt is not allowed to reduce All.TimeMax\n\n");
00819       endrun(556);
00820     }
00821 
00822   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00823     ti_end = log(TimeMax_new / All.TimeBegin) / All.Timebase_interval;
00824   else
00825     ti_end = (TimeMax_new - All.TimeBegin) / All.Timebase_interval;
00826 
00827   while(ti_end > TIMEBASE)
00828     {
00829       All.Timebase_interval *= 2.0;
00830 
00831       ti_end /= 2;
00832       All.Ti_Current /= 2;
00833 
00834 #ifdef PMGRID
00835       All.PM_Ti_begstep /= 2;
00836       All.PM_Ti_endstep /= 2;
00837 #endif
00838 
00839       for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00840         {
00841           P[i].Ti_begstep /= 2;
00842           P[i].Ti_endstep /= 2;
00843         }
00844     }
00845 
00846   All.TimeMax = TimeMax_new;
00847 }
